country_code.description: ISO code of country from `country` table

lang.description: Language code e.g. en, fr, de etc.

objective.description: If mission is Goal then add its objective. e.g. Plant 100 trees

label_goal_achieved.description: If mission is Goal then add its label of goal achieved. e.g. Achieved goal

label_goal_objective.description: If mission is Goal then add its label of objective. e.g Tree plantation

section.description: These section are for 'Mission' tab in front end, you can add unlimited amount of sections(Title+description)

custom_information.description: This is for Custom Information in mission detail page. You will need to add title+description which will appear on Information section.

sort_key.description: Sort Order for mission tabs. It must be numeric value. Example: 0,1,2,3

lang.description: Language code. Example: en, fr, es etc.
Language code e.g. en, fr, de etc.

document_id.description: If adding new document then leave it blank

media_id.description: If adding new media then leave it blank

default.description: If its set as 1, then mission thumbnail will be set to this media

media_id.description: If adding new media then leave it blank

un_sdg.description: Array of valid UN SDG numbers (1 to 17)

organization_id.description: This id is reference to organization table

country_code.description: ISO code of country from `country` table

lang.description: Language code e.g. en, fr, de etc.

objective.description: If mission is Goal then add its objective. e.g. Plant 100 trees

label_goal_achieved.description: If mission is Goal then add its label of goal achieved. e.g. Achieved goal

label_goal_objective.description: If mission is Goal then add its label of objective. e.g Tree plantation

section.description: These section are for 'Mission' tab in front end, you can add unlimited amount of sections(Title+description)

custom_information.description: This is for Custom Information in mission detail page. You will need to add title+description which will appear on Information section.

mission_tab_id.description: Provide mission_tab_id to update an existing record

sort_key.description: Sort Order for mission tabs. It must be numeric value. Example: 0,1,2,3

lang.description: Language code. Example: en, fr, es etc.
Language code e.g. en, fr, de etc.

document_id.description: If adding new document then leave it blank

media_id.description: If adding new media then leave it blank

default.description: If its set as 1, then mission thumbnail will be set to this media

media_id.description: If adding new media then leave it blank

mission_impact_id.description: Required only when updating an existing mission impact

impact_donation_id.description: Required only when updating an existing impact donation

un_sdg.description: Array of valid UN SDG numbers (1 to 17)

organization_id.description: This id is reference to organization table
